name: Come Outside
description:
RECOMMENDED BUILD: 384x240

Xbox One and Ps4 controllers have been tested, but should work on all controllers

keyboard and mouse are also supported

Keyboard Controls: 

WASD to move, mouse to turn, E to interact, F for flashlight, shift to run.

Controller controls:

Left Stick to move, Right Stick to turn, x/square to interact, click in the Right Stick for flashlight, click and hold Left Stick to run.

A game about doing your laundry. Don't go outside.

This game was made in two weeks for the Fitchburg State University Fall 2020 Game jam by:

Kris Camp - Producer, Programming, Level Design

Tori Croteau - Level Design, Programmer, Git Master

Tobey-Julian Joseph - Audio, Programming, Level Design

Jaden Servant - UI, programming

Rolinda Marcelino - Asset Design

Fintan Neff - Asset Design, Programming

Harold AC - Asset Design

Emily Stone - Voice Actress

Special thanks to Rachel!

HOW TO PLAY:

At the start of the game, you must grab your laundry next to your bed in your room, bring it down stars to the washing machine furthest to the right, then return to your bed, and go to sleep. DONT GO OUTSIDE!
